Class DGCommand

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--DGCommand
public class DGCommand
extends java.lang.Object

This is a static class that holds constants for each different command. To add a new command, give it a short value here and add a corresponding block of code in the DGBattle class.

Version:
0.1 Java
Author:
Evan Hildreth, root -1 Entertainment
